remarks: Implications for the value of a function defined by the maps-to notation with a class abstraction as a result having an element.  Here, the base set of the class abstraction depends on the argument of the function. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
statement:
elfvmptrab1.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> { y e. [_ x / m ]_ M | ph } ) $.
elfvmptrab1.v $e |- ( X e. V -> [_ X / m ]_ M e. _V ) $.
elfvmptrab1 $p |- ( Y e. ( F ` X ) -> ( X e. V /\ Y e. [_ X / m ]_ M ) ) $.
$d M x y $.
$d V x $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y y $.
$d m y $.
